channel.title: ~Error While Loading Moparscape~
channel.description: This is what comes up when i try to load moparscape. Ive tried restarting my computer, uninstalling and and reinstalling it. Nothing has worked. Idk if it could be my Java types i have. These are what i have: J2SE Runtime Environment 5.0 update 11 & Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment 6. Plz help if you know what I could do......[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:02:05 PM[/size][hr]ok it wont let me put the picture up....

item.title: ~Error While Loading Moparscape~
item.dc:creator: @pur3_ftw pur3 ftw
item.description:
@pur3_ftw wrote:

ok it says:
Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape.
To fix this try the following(in order):

  1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
  2. Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools> internet options
  3. Try using a different game-world
  4. Try rebooting your computer
  5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:18:29 PM[/size][hr]I searched moparscape in my computer and it there was something saything this:
    Exception in thread “Thread-8” java.lang.NullPointerException
    at client.method94(client.java:6689)
    at client.method9(client.java:7842)
    at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:108)
    at client.run(client.java:4081)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

if that means anything?
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:20:20 PM[/size][hr]will anyone help?

Read full topic
